span.span: Represents a service that provides XAML schema context information to type converters and markup extensions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服務會提供一個屬性， 。The service provides one property, . 使用服務及其屬性，當您需要作用中的 XAML 結構描述內容來自標記延伸或類型轉換子實作。Use the service and its property when you need the active XAML schema context from a markup extension or type converter implementation. 有可用的 XAML 結構描述內容依賴許多 XAML 相關的作業，最值得注意的解析成物件圖形建立，其支援的類型的 XAML 型別。Many XAML-related operations, most notably resolving a XAML type into its backing type for object graph creation, rely on having an available XAML schema context. 不過，許多情況下，您可以使用特定架構所提供的 XAML 結構描述內容。However, for many scenarios, you can use the XAML schema context that is provided by a particular framework. 或者，您可以使用.NET Framework XAML 服務，它會使用 CLR 與反映支援所提供的預設 XAML 結構描述內容，並可以針對任何 CLR 定義的類型提供必要的 XAML 結構描述內容。Or you can use the default XAML schema context provided by .NET Framework XAML Services, which uses CLR and reflection backing and can provide the necessary XAML schema context for any CLR-defined type. 服務是主要是關於預期它支援自訂 XAML 結構描述的內容時，可能會呼叫其值轉換器實作的實作。The service is mainly relevant for implementations that anticipate that their value converter implementation might be called when it is supported by custom XAML schema contexts. 您可以取得服務的虛擬方法的進入點參數從或該報表服務內容。You can get the service from the entry-point parameters of the virtual methods of or that report service context. 或者，您改為可以直接從特定的 XAML 讀取器或 XAML 寫入器專用的屬性來取得結構描述內容。Or you can instead get the schema context directly from dedicated properties of specific XAML readers or XAML writers.
